name: Fedora United
tagline: Repository with additional software for Fedora 24 and Fedora 25
body:
***
### Welcome to Fedora United Project.
We maintain the multimedia and other software and addons which is missing in original repositories of [Fedora](https://getfedora.org/). Play and work with multimedia, use Web without problems.

### How to enable Fedora United repository in your system
Run this code in your console from superuser:

```
# dnf config-manager --add-repo=http://fedoraunited.github.io/fedora-enjoy24.repo
```

Mirror:
```
# dnf config-manager --add-repo=https://gitlab.com/FedoraUnited/repository/raw/master/fedora-enjoy24.rep
```

Now you can install packages:

```
# dnf update
# dnf install vlc mpv ffmpeg gnome-mpv
```

### List of most popular software in our repository
* `Vlc`
* `Mpv`
* `GNOME-mpv`
* `Chromium (all multimedia HTML5 content, flash player)`
* `Kdenlive`
* `VirtualBox`
* `OBS-studio`
* `GNOME Internet Radio Locator program`
* `Smplayer`
* `Fobnix`
* `Idjc`
* `Cmus`
* `Minidlna`
* `mplayer`
* `Gstreamer codecs`


### Authors and Contributors

Fedora United was founded by David Vásquez (@kuboosoft), big part of work in the beginning was done by Sérgio Basto (@sergiomb2) and Pavlo Rudyi (@paulcarroty). List of all contributors you can find [here](https://github.com/orgs/FedoraUnited/people).



### Support or Contact

Having trouble with any package or Fedora United repository? Need some software? Want to submit your package? Check out our [latest issues](https://github.com/FedoraUnited/packages/issues), [list of packages](https://github.com/FedoraUnited), [Wiki](https://github.com/FedoraUnited/packages/wiki) and we’ll help you sort it out.

***
